_header: This silver plate and rich array
_description: Verses asserting that worldly pomp is unnecessary — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
This silver plate and riche arayeOf purple hewe dothe monderus
                    wellffor desguising in a stage playeOver lyff nedethe them not a
                    dele
